titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 101: Maimonides' commentary on the Mishnah, Middot 1:8-2:4

notesStmt.note: Article endings marked with three dots (ellipsis?) and two spaces; The folio contains the end of the commentary on Middot Chapter 1, parallel to, in the published edition: Mishnah ʹim perush Mosheh ben Maimon / Yosef Kafaḥ [transl.]. Jerusalem : Mosad ha-Rav Ḳuḳ, 1963-1967, vol. 5, p. 435 l. 2 תנגלק – II 4 ibid. p. 437 l. 15 [סיקול פי ה[ד'א אלפרק; Includes the three illustrations to this text, generally similar to the illustrations in the autograph ms. (Oxford Bodleian 404); Mishnah text is not copied.
Condition: includes the three illustrations to this text; nearly complete, damaged and faded in a few places.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msItem.title: Maimonides' commentary on the Mishnah, Middot 1:8-2:4
msItem.author: Maimonides, Moses, 1135-1204. موسى بن ميمون משה בן מימון, 1138-1204 Моше Бен Маймон, 1135-1204 Ibn Maymūn, Mūsā b. ʿUbayd (Abū ʿImrān Mūsā b. ʿUbayd), 1135-1204 Moïse Maïmonide, 1135-1204 Maimónides, 1135-1204 Maimonide, Moïse, 1135-1204 Moïse Maïmonide 1138-1204 Maimonides, Moses, 1138-1204 Maimónides משה בן מימון موسى بن ميمون، 529-601 هـ. Moses ben Maimon, 1135-1204 Maimonides, Moses إبن ميمون، أبو عمران موسى بن عبيد الله، 1135-1204 Ibn Maimūn, Mūsā, 1135-1204 Mūsā ibn Maimūn, 1135-1204

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 23 (recto), 24 (verso); ruling method: left rule justified by slanting last word downward.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
